page.title: 09Play time.
page.content:
At play time we play lots of games.
Some of us play rounders and we have four posts, four post men, three batters and one bat.
Some play hop scotch, you have to have a stone and numbers in boxes drawn on the ground. Number one goes in one box and two and three in a long box with a line in the middle and it goes on to ten.
Sometimes we play our own made up games. I play a game with some of my friends and it is called "horses escape" and a witch gets our horses and we get involved in lots of adventures.
